com.adiant.android.ads

Interface INativeAdFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NativeAdFactory

    public interface INativeAdFactory
    Creates native ads.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroy()
      Cleans up any used resources
      NativeAd getAd(int position, int itemCount)
      Returns an ad if there are ads and one should be shown to the user.
      AdListener getAdListener()
      Returns the event listener.
      int getCount(int itemCount)
      Gets the total count of items and ads.
      boolean isAdShownAt(int position)
      Returns whether an ad was rendered at the specified position (including previous rendered ads).
      void setAdListener(AdListener adListener)
      Sets the listener for events related to loading native ads.
      boolean shouldShowAd(int position, int itemCount)
      Returns whether an ad should to shown to the user at the specified position considering there will the specified total number of items.
      int totalAdsShown()
      Return the total number of ads that have been rendered thus far.

    • Method Detail

      • shouldShowAd

        boolean shouldShowAd(int position,
                     int itemCount)
        Returns whether an ad should to shown to the user at the specified position considering there will the specified total number of items.
        Parameters:
        position - current position (including ads)
        itemCount - total number of items (excluding ads)
        Returns:
        whether an ad should be shown

      • getAd

        NativeAd getAd(int position,
               int itemCount)
        Returns an ad if there are ads and one should be shown to the user.
        Parameters:
        position - current position (including ads)
        itemCount - total number of items (excluding ads)
        Returns:
        ad to show to the user

      • isAdShownAt

        boolean isAdShownAt(int position)
        Returns whether an ad was rendered at the specified position (including previous rendered ads).
        Parameters:
        position - position include ads
        Returns:
        whether an ad was rendered at the position.

      • totalAdsShown

        int totalAdsShown()
        Return the total number of ads that have been rendered thus far.
        Returns:
        count of ads rendered so far

      • getCount

        int getCount(int itemCount)
        Gets the total count of items and ads.
        Parameters:
        itemCount - total number of items (excluding ads)
        Returns:
        total count of items and ads

      • setAdListener

        void setAdListener(AdListener adListener)
        Sets the listener for events related to loading native ads.
        Parameters:
        adListener - listener

      • getAdListener

        AdListener getAdListener()
        Returns the event listener.
        Returns:
        ad listener

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        Cleans up any used resources
